Name: Lost Memories 3 Side Stories
About the game: The game will be free forever, after all, for the purpose of publicizing another game of mine, 'Lost Memories 3: Dream Of Four Leaves Clover'. Important note: Use the modifier to modify the data in the game will be judged cheating, the penalty is life-long ban on running the game! The game moderate liver injury, clearance time at least 200 hours, before you buy it must be estimated whether the body can bear it. This game is designed to promote another game of mine, 'Lost Memories 3: Dream Of Four Leaves Clover'. If you are interested in this game, you can continue to buy the other. But the other game is only available in Chinese.
